wc3open: I already knew this, but getting an education at Northwestern is expensive! I was not aware that over half of Northwestern families pay the full price for an academic year. This information leads me to believe that a lot of my peers have a considerable amount of money. It makes me think that the Northwestern community is privileged.
wc4open: This speaks both to the type of people attending Northwestern and the quality of Northwestern's facilities, education, etc. If there is this much money being poured into the university, then an education must be of a very high quality. It surprises me that this much money is being donated per year by parents of students/alumni. If I were not already a student here, it might worry me as to whether I would fit in at a place with people who come from such wealthy backgrounds.
